task_text: Well, ramp and dock floor system project for NordPort Logistics Parks needs stronger capability in Project management. Who would be the best internal expert outside of the project to consult?

project.name: Loading ramp and dock floor system
project.description: Impact- and slip-resistant floor system for NordPort loading ramps and dock areas.

text_blocks: Now I have the project details. The project team consists of employees iv5n_008 (Lead), iv5n_039 (Engineer), and iv5n_106 (Ops). I need to find the best internal expert in Project Management who is NOT already on this project team.

I found the employees with strong project management skills. The project team consists of:
- iv5n_008 (Daniele Lombardi) - Lead
- iv5n_039 (Valentino Serra) - Engineer  
- iv5n_106 - Ops

The top expert outside the project is **Enrico Costa** with skill_project_mgmt at level 10, and he's not on the project team. Let me verify iv5n_039 is indeed on the team (it appears in the results but I need to exclude those on the project).

From the results:
- **Enrico Costa (iv5n_004)** - skill_project_mgmt level **10** - NOT on project team - **BEST CHOICE**
- iv5n_039 (Valentino Serra) has level 7 but is already on the project team

input.message:
The best internal expert to consult for Project Management outside of the "Loading ramp and dock floor system" project for NordPort Logistics Parks is **Enrico Costa** from Corporate Leadership.

He has a **skill_project_mgmt level of 10** (the highest in the company) and is not currently on the project team. Enrico also has strong complementary skills including:
- Production Planning: 10
- Willingness to mentor juniors: 6
- Cross-site collaboration: 8
- People management interest: 8

The current project team consists of Daniele Lombardi (Lead), Valentino Serra (Engineer), and one Ops team member. Enrico would be an excellent resource to strengthen the project management capability.
